scripts.prebootstrap: npm run mkdirs && npm run mod:check && npm run js:check && npm run icons:check
scripts.mod:check: [ -d node_modules ] && echo 'modules found' || echo 'getting modules...' && npm install
scripts.js:check: [ -f dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js ] && echo 'bootstrap js found' || echo 'getting bootstrap js...' && npm run js:copy
scripts.icons:check: [ -f dist/icons/bootstrap-icons.css ] && echo 'bootstrap icons found' || echo 'getting bootstrap icons...' && npm run icons:copy
